chart_description: This chart shows the aggregated bandwidth usage of physical network interfaces in kilobits per second. It can help you monitor your network performance and identify any potential bottlenecks.

dimension_descriptions.InOctets: This dimension measures the number of bytes received on the network interface over a specified time period. It can help you identify which interfaces are receiving the most data.
dimension_descriptions.OutOctets: This dimension measures the number of bytes sent out on the network interface over a specified time period. It can help you identify which interfaces are sending the most data.
